Dialogue.Lines: I dont think we have had the pleasure to meet, are you not the new asp? My name is Albin.

Choices.Choice: GOOD+Uguu!
GOOD+H….HI!
GOOD+M.. m.. MoshI moshi!

Responses.Response: Haha, are you not a lively one.
Haha, are you not a lively one.
Haha, are you not a lively one.

Dialogue.Lines: You dont need to be nervous I know that its a lot to take in as a new student and sexmasterist but you will get into it in no time. I can feel it!

Choices.Choice: GOOD+Thanks!
GOOD+I dont know… but I will do my best!
GOOD+Arigato Albin-senpai!

Responses.Response: That's the spirit!
That's the spirit!
Don´t lose your waaaaay!

Dialogue.Lines: If you ever need help or just company you can find me here at the school campus.
Is this not a fantastic day to sit outside and study? I just love the grass! What can I help you with?

Choices.Choice: GOOD+I like not killing animals!
BAD+Do… do you smoke it?
NEUTRAL+Do my looks MEAT you expectation?

Responses.Response: What!? Me too! Oh can you just feel how the nature loves it when we don't kill animals!?
What, no! I dont do illegal things. Shame on you for thinking that!
Haha… funny but I'm vegan.

Dialogue.Lines: What do you love about not killing animals?

Choices.Choice: BAD+So I can use them to get milk and eggs!
NEUTRAL+Im scared of blood…
GOOD+All animals suffering needs to end!

Responses.Response: You're just awful.
Yes, but the colour red is still one that stands for a beautiful vision!
Could not agree more, its just an awful situation.

Dialogue.Lines: How do you think we could make the world a better place!?

Choices.Choice: NEUTRAL+I think we should kill all humans that hurt animals!
GOOD+If we all put in a little effort a lot of animals could be saved!
BAD+I want your penis inside me!

Responses.Response: Human lives matter too!
I think so too! I think we will get along great. I look forward to talking with you again!
What!?

Dialogue.Lines: Ah its so nice being here around the grass but it makes me a little hungry. What can I do for you?

Choices.Choice: GOOD+I know that you're vegan but I hope you like cheesy pick up lines!
BAD+Is your body a big Mac cause I'm loving it?
NEUTRAL+Niku umai?

Responses.Response: Haha sure I actually like them!
I think its time for you to leave.
Nanii?

Choices.Choice: GOOD+You´re a cutecumber!
NEUTRAL+I don´t think I can milk these jokes anymore
BAD+I think I´m a hamburger because I want you to slip your meat between my buns

Responses.Response: If I'm a cutecumber then youre a fineapple!
Milking a cow is rape but it was a fun joke.
I think its time for you to leave now.

Choices.Choice: GOOD+I guess I'm a carrot because whatever you do I'm still ROOTIng for you.
NEUTRAL+I think I'm a turkey because I want you to stuff me tonight!
BAD+I want to be your bitch cause you really are a hot dog!

Responses.Response: Everytime we meet I like you a little bit more!
Please dont talk to me again or Im calling the cops.
...Haha...

Dialogue.Lines: Even a computer scientist can love being in the sun with the grass under his feet! What can I help you with?

Choices.Choice: GOOD+Do you love anime and beer?
NEUTRAL+Do you like long walks at the beach?
BAD+I think RNG and range champions in video games are fun!

Responses.Response: Its not like I-l...love anime… b… baka!
Not really my thing.
Thats it, Im calling the cops.

Choices.Choice: NEUTRAL+Do you like moose beer?
GOOD+Dont you just love the animes when the main character always wins and the story will never have anything unexpected in them?
BAD+D… do you want to drink Blackcurrant Schnapps and watch anime someday?

Responses.Response: Please leave now.
Oh my god! I love them!
(VOMITS LOUDLY)

Choices.Choice: GOOD+D… do you want to drink beer and watch anime someday?
NEUTRAL+Do you want to watch an actually good anime with me like Berserk or Jojo?
BAD+Do you want to watch pokemon with me?

Responses.Response: Its a date!
No, I'm boring.
Pokemon is not vegan!
